Header: Minister Fonseka 'not sure' of his political future
Content: Minister Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka says that he is not sure whether he would be elected to parliament in the forthcoming election. He was speaking at a public rally held at the Medawachchiya Divisional Secretariat yesterday (Jul 01). He said he has only 1 and 1/2 years and he had decided to erect elephant fences during the remaining time. He also said so far elephant fences covering a length of 4500 km exist in Sri Lanka.
